remarks: Define a cyclic group, which is a group with an element ` x ` , called the generator of the group, such that all elements in the group are multiples of ` x ` .  A generator is usually not unique.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
df-cyg $p |- CycGrp = { g e. Grp | E. x e. ( Base ` g ) ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` g ) x ) ) = ( Base ` g ) } $.
$d g n x $.
